messages.subject: SATSUMA SAMURAI
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Brethren, I just stumbled on a link that may be of interest to some. On a whim I put satsuma samurai into google (with quotes) and got some 64 hits.
messages.messageBody:
Dear Brethren,

I just stumbled on a link that may be of interest to some.

On a whim I put "satsuma samurai" into google (with quotes) and got some 64
hits. Here is the search string:
http://www.google.com.au/search?hl=en&q=%22satsuma+samurai%22&meta=

Looks like some interesting reading.

Regards,

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)
